text: Apani ki tadera dekhena ni yara mrtyubhaye hajare hajare sbiya abasabhumi parityaga karechila[1]? Atahpara allah‌ taderake balechilena, ‘tomara mare ya'o’. Tarapara allah‌ taderake jibita karechilena. Niscaya'i allah‌ manusera prati anugrahasila; kintu adhikansa loka krtajnata prakasa kare na
